import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import ProductCrousel from "../productCrousel" export default function Wishlist() { const [wishlist, setWislist] = useState([]); const [reload, setReload] = useState(1); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}wishlist`).then(res => { setWislist(res.data.rows.map(wl => wl.product)); }) }, [reload]) return (
